description: Learn how to make the best egg fried rice with this easy fried rice recipe. It's quick, satisfying and packed with veg â€“ perfect for a speedy dinner or side dish.
keywords: Fried rice,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Low sugar,Sesame free,Fakeaway,High protein,High fibre,Rice,Peanut free
name: Simple Egg Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice according to packet instructions, following absorption method, adding carrot and peas for the last 5 minutes of cooking time. Fluff up rice mixture with a fork.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat. Add egg and swirl to coat base in a thin layer. Cook for 2 minutes or until set and golden underneath. Transfer to a plate. When cool enough to handle, roll into a log and thinly slice.

Heat butter in same wok or frying pan over high heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add rice and soy sauce, and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until heated through. Serve topped with egg.
